duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct patient care and support under the supervision of nursing staff.
Assist with patient activities of daily living and maintain a clean and safe environment for patients.
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and other healthcare team members.
Complete clinical rotations as per the requirements of the role.

education_certification.credential: Certified Nursing Assistant (CNA) certification or completion of at least 1 clinical rotation in Nursing School
